channel.title: PowerShell Linux on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community
channel.description: Recent content in PowerShell Linux on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community

item.title: Azure DevTest Labs Artifact for Installing PowerShell on Linux
item.description: Update: The PowerShell on Linux artifact is now available in official Azure DTL artifact repository. Bartek and Ben have written a great introduction article on open source PowerShell.

item.title: Open source PowerShell on Windows, Linux, and OS X!
item.description: This article was co-authored by Bartek Bielawski and Ben Gelens. Windows PowerShell is a powerful tool, but it always had one very serious limitation: it was possible to run it only on Windows.
